courseHighlights.title: Module Architecture
courseHighlights.content: Before learning the framework, itâ€™s always suggested to get the whole picture out of it. Our course covers the understanding of the Angular Architecture to help you with the basics building blocks of Angular.

courseHighlights.title: Component Driven Architecture
courseHighlights.content: Angular is a great example of component driven Architecture, this course will help you to grasp the basic knowledge of Component Architecture along with the understanding of Angular components in depth.

courseHighlights.title: Integrating Third Party API
courseHighlights.content: Understanding Services and Observables will help you to integrate your applications with the third party apps in the most easiest and effective way. This course will help you in making Network Requests to a REST API and to represent real-time results in intuitive frontend design.

courseContents.title: Angular Basics
courseContents.description: The basics of Typescript will help you to build strong foundations before starting with the Angular Framework. In this lecture, we will dive into Typescript fundamentals along with basic setup of Angular-cli

courseContents.title: Introduction to Components
courseContents.description: Bindings are the building blocks of Angular. In this lecture, we will cover all types of bindings along with examples that will help us in understanding Components.
points: One way bindings using property and Event

courseContents.title: Components & Routing
courseContents.description: This lecture will focus on Angular Routings and will help to understand the logics behind parent and child routings.

courseContents.title: Directives and Pipes
courseContents.description: Whenever we manipulate DOM, we need to use Angular Directives. In this lecture we will learn how we can make custom directives and can use them in our components

courseContents.title: Understanding Forms
courseContents.lectures: Have you seen any website without forms. Most of the websites, we use today contains Form Elements, but how we can make these forms in Angular. This lecture will help you to understand forms along with their validations
points: Template Driven Forms, Input and Validation
Binding to Radio Buttons and Checkboxes

courseContents.title: Services and HTTP
courseContents.description: Interacting with an API is so easy if you are using Angular Services. In this lecture, we will cover Angular Services by making network requests to a REST API
